entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Span overload for SynchronizationContext.Wait(...) #104858
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Remove unneeded comments from API surface area #104846
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Remove `unsafe` from APIs that do not use pointers. #104845
    9.0.0
  • Introducing Environment.ProcessorUserTime & ProcessorPrivilegedTime #104844
    9.0.0

Closed

  • HTTP client metrics: url.scheme should be opt-in, server.port should be required #94829
    9.0.0
  • ICorDebugRegisterSet.GetThreadContext fails on macOS arm64 #104816
    9.0.0
  • Consider adding activities for potentially long running network operations #93832
    9.0.0
  • HTTP/3 Test Failure: SocketsHttpHandler_DiagnosticsTest_Http3.SendAsync_ExpectedDiagnosticCancelledLogging #104699
    9.0.0
  • Intermittent errors building CoreCLR on Windows ARM #104674
    9.0.0
  • Certain build configurations are "less efficient" #76516
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: add ability to do semantic comparisons of JSON values à la JToken.DeepEquals() #33388
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Unnecessary prolog frame setup in .NET 9 #104658
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketOptionNameTest.MulticastInterface_Set_IPv6_XXXXX_Succeeds failing #90491
  • SslStream Custom Algorithm Support #103466

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT: Fix Socket_UDS_Success_ActivityRecorded test #104862
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Issue 104700: Clarify error message for collection property with no getter #104861
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add fedora in install script #104860
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove `GTF_IS_IN_CSE` #104855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [NO REVIEW] Investigating WinHttp issue #104852
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid buffer copying in JSON number equality comparison #104850
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Expose the Sin, Cos, and SinCos methods on the Vector types #104848
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Define equals manually for Swift JitInterface InlineArray types. #104843
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Enable fixed disabled System.Text.Json tests #104771
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • HTTP Metrics: Uncoditionally report server.port #104741
    area-System.Net.Http, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Add toolchain instructions for Fedora #104859
    area-Meta
  • Fix arm64 MacOS and Linux Managed Debugging #104847
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricSelectCoefficient`, `TrigonometricStartingValue` #104681
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `AddSequentialAcross` #104640
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Remove GTF_BOOLEAN #104779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Add null check in case we can't get H/3 inboundControlStream #104797
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Extend usage of GC_ALLOC_ALIGN8 #104781
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ensure that the correct VC++ toolset is selected in all build environments #104763
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Expose `JsonElement.DeepEquals` #104579
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • JIT: defer creating throw helper code until we know it's needed #104819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Update thread contract doc to align with implementation and other contract docs #104832
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • JIT: Avoid boxing ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull arguments in Tier-0 #104815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2494304 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • JIT: Added Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask #104704
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make it possible to trim custom attribute artifacts #100395
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Get ThreadContext for AVX registers #104818
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.8
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104662
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricMultiplyAddCoefficient` #104697
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • SPMI: Add a buffer to `FileWriter` and add a `--parallelism` option to superpmi.py #104789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Throw ObjectDisposedException instead of NullReferenceException #104821
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104837
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104838
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #104541
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix a potential out-of-bound read in RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver #104536
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] When reconciling shadow stack after catch, use more precise way to figure how much to pop. #104652
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add runtime metrics in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` #104680
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Fix SSP restoring in edge cases #104820
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #104829
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 6.0.x
  • Value num refine phis #104752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make OpenSSL ENGINE support light up #104810
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security
